app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Tchap
app_description: Tchap is an instant messaging service designed for communications between French government officials to exchange sensitive or less sensitive information on the go or from an office workstation. Tchap allows you to chat with one on one and group messages and to share files like any instant messenger with a built in directory of user agents simultaneous use on multiple devices with a high level of security and confidentiality of private exchanges. Tchap is reserved for state officials and people invited into a professional conversation with a state official.
